name: Alia Chaudhri
text: If I could give zero stars I would. This place is the biggest joke of a restaurant ever. They gave me a thin crust pizza and refused to admit their mistake. I had ordered a pan. Called them and they me told …More

name: Marian Gladden
text: Overall, the pizza was delicious and filling. The crust was not too thin and not too thick, and perfectly cooked. The sauce tasted unique although I prefer a bit more spice in my sauce. Good and efficient service too

name: Raj Jayanthi
text: I am rating the service not the pizza. My son loves their pizza, but not me. I am very pleased with the service. They were courteous, professional and friendly. When I placed the order, a discount didn't apply. He helped me fix it. Another …More

name: Dylan Lowery
text: Ordered a pizza that never came. Was assured by staff three times that the pizza was "on its way". After hours had passed, I asked for a refund since I ordered online. Was told to call back later. Was charged anyway and it took a week and to get my money back. Will never order from here again.

name: Joe Sumanth
text: I live nearby and it's easier to pickup.  Delivery fee is overpriced.  They make it quick and keep it warmed until picked up.  I'm also impressed at how their quality and options of style and flavor of pizza increased.  Much better than Dominos.

name: Jon Moore
text: Love their personal pan pizza. Nice service

name: Erica Wilson
text: They don’t answer the phone when you call. When you go to pick up they are just sitting around and playing. They act like they don’t want to take your order. When you get your order they mess it up and get an attitude when you want them to fix it or have your money back.

name: George Haskell
text: Quick bite for the kids near Villanova university. Pizza wasn't bad. Staff seemed bothered to serve us.

name: J. B.
text: Didn't know pizza hut was even at this location not very clean server wasn't very pleasant I've had better pizza hut at other locations don't think I'll be going back any time soon...

name: Larry Graham
text: We've ordered from here 3 times now and every time they have either given us the wrong order completely or have forgotten an item and delivery times are incredibly long. The customer service is horrible as other reviewers have noted and …More

name: Anthony M
text: Horrible store.... truly. The person called me "fat" because I was ordering a pizza after becoming upset that I was trying to make a complaint about a  matter. Shame on Ronak Foods LLC company!

name: Justin Taylor
text: Quick delivery just be sure to get your order in by 10:30.

name: Natalie Caroline
text: Horrible ass customer service! Pregnant woman on shift right now is so rude when asking what kind of fries they have. They always look miserable to work here! Need to hire new staff or maybe a new manager!! This store sucks

name: kristen preston
text: Ordered pizza at 12:19 for lunch and waited over 2 hours for the pizza to arrive. When I called back to ask about they kept making excuses about being busy. Pizza came like warm. So disappointed. Shame on you Pizza Hut. Next time I'll stick with dominos

name: Amanda Gunn
text: The pizza has a frozen taste and no sauce. Go somewhere else for pizza!!

name: Taysha Torres
text: Well for one, my delivery guy didn't even know what change to give me. My total was $21.70 and I gave hime $40. He didn't have enough change, he only had $12. I took the $12 and he said he would come back for the other $6, never did. To top …More

name: Mike Leeland
text: Terrible service all around

name: Ken Frascella
text: The sausage pizza is outstanding!

name: Timothy Blackburn
text: Just don’t do it. We called twice. The first time we were told the manager was in the bathroom so she couldn’t take our order, and asked us to call back in 5 minutes. 5 minutes later we call back, and she can’t take our order because she can’t get the computer to work and than hangs up on us. Never trying to order from here again.

name: George waffles
text: Placed an order online. Was called 30 minutes later to be told. "This is a pick up only location."

name: Lauren Rodino
text: They no longer deliver. Now my only option is Dominos.

name: Raeonna Perkins
text: Love this place best worker. Keep up the work.!!!!

name: Joseph Forman
text: Don’t pick up their phone...

name: Vinod Parnati
text: Great

name: Andrew Schoettler
text: Pizza took an hour, I called to ask and rude person hung up on me after giving false info- never again!

name: justin carew
text: Great service, fast and friendly

name: Yas Cruz
text: Called today before they opened at 11, a gentleman "the supposed manager" named Joel picked up with a very nasty attitude and said hold. Had me on hold for 5 minutes to  come back on the line and when i asked if they're hiring, he responded …More

name: Philip Lerman
text: Store is closed. No more Hut

name: Stephen Fellona
text: Thanks for the over cooked pizza. I should of listened to the reviews on this location. All I ordered was 1 plain cheese pizza for pick up at 7:45 pm on a Sunday night. Lame...

name: Jarrid Thelen
text: A bit expensive for mediocre pizza then again it is mainline I guess

name: Ol James G
text: My pizza looked like it had been sexually assaulted.

name: Sumno
text: Just pizza, no issues.

name: MJ DelValle
text: Ordered online and the wrong location got our order then called the right location and said we have to pick up the food because theirs no driver there . . What's the whole point of ordering n how is there no driver on schedule .
